title: Media Credibility, Economic Divides, and Europe's Ukraine Fatigue: What Russian Media Sees in Western Chaos
summary: Russian media is highlighting Western institutional failures this week, from the BBC scandal to European divisions over Ukraine support, painting a picture of declining Western unity and credibility.

key_narratives: Western disorganization and the unsustainability of current support levels for Ukraine
russian_perspective.media_framing: See full article for detailed analysis

western_perspective.comparison: bureaucratic dysfunction in Washington and its concrete military consequences
western_perspective.key_differences: See article for Western vs Russian framing comparison
